summary: SummaryIndie Lee Restorative Eye Cream reduces the appearance of fine lines and promotes brighter, plumper, more youthful looking skin.
details: DetailsBenefitsReduces the appearance of fine lines and diminishes the visible signs of agingPromotes brighter, plumper, more youthful looking skinConditions and moisturizes skin around the eyesKey IngredientsTiger Grass & Apple Stem Cells pair with Paracress extract to reduce the appearance of fine lines and diminish visible signs of agingConditioning Seaweed extract and Licorice Root promote brighter, plumper, more youthful looking skinHyaluronic Acid provides continuous moisture, binding up to 1,000 times its weight in waterFeaturesLeaping Bunny Certified, cruelty-free, and printed on FSC certified paperAlways formulated without 1,300+ banned ingredients, including: Parabens, Mineral Oil, Sulfate-based detergents, Synthetic Fragrance, Petroleum-based ingredients, Phthalates, Phenoxyethanol, Formaldehyde and GMO ingredientsVeganGreat for all skinCOSMOS NATURALItem 2596764How To UseGently apply to the eye contour morning and evening.Precautions: For external use only. This product is formulated with Glycerin and may contain Soy.IngredientsWater (Aqua), C15-19 Alkane,Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Propanediol, Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Seed Oil, Cetearyl Alcohol, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Squalane (Olive), Cetyl Alcohol, Mangifera Indica (Mango) Seed Butter, Arachidyl Alcohol, Glycerin, Glyceryl Undecylenate, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice Powder, Centella Asiatica (Gotu Kola) Meristem Cell Culture, Malus Domestica (Swiss Apple) Fruit Cell Culture Extract, Glycyrrhiza Glabra (Licorice) Root Extract, Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid, Laminaria Ochroleuca (Seaweed) Extract, Acmella Oleracea (Paracress) Flower/Leaf/Stem Extract, Euphorbia Cerifera (Candelilla) Wax, Cetearyl Glucoside, Behenyl Alcohol , Isomalt, Arachidyl Glucoside, Xylitylglucoside, Anhydroxylitol, Xanthan Gum, Acacia Gum, Tocopherol, Xylitol, Gluconolactone, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate, Citric Acid. 99% Natural Origin of Total.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Gently apply to the eye contour morning and evening.Precautions: For external use only. This product is formulated with Glycerin and may contain Soy.
ingredients: Centella Asiatica (Gotu Kola) Meristem Cell Culture
Malus Domestica (Swiss Apple) Fruit Cell Culture Extract
Citric Acid. 99% Natural Origin of Total

reviews.headline: Nice Cream But Burns Eyes
reviews.comments: I really like the feel of this cream, but i find that if I tear up just slightly, it burns my eyes. Sometimes even getting it too close to my eye can cause a burning sensation, so i have to be very careful. The texture of the cream is nice and hydrating though. As others have mentioned, the packaging is terrible. The pump dispenses way too much cream or not at all, and it constantly "spits" product out because of bubbles in the dispenser. I will not be repurchasing.

reviews.headline: LOVE,
reviews.comments: Love this product and noticed a change within weeks of using, would def buy over over. Love how light weight and non greasy this product is. Made skin feel so soft and the skin soaked it up right away with just enough of Dewey look. Love love love,,,,

reviews.headline: Great Product
reviews.comments: This is an amazing product but the packaging is simply the worst. The pump barely functions. I had to store it upside down to get the product to the top and pump like crazy to get it out. Change the packaging to a pot and its a solid 5 Stars.

reviews.headline: I love this eye cream!!!
reviews.comments: It has been wonderful to find brand that has clean ingredients, amazing smell, light and refreshing. It works and seen great results. I'm happy to use this brand for my skin and I recommend it to all that ask what I use.

reviews.headline: Works fine for me
reviews.comments: Others have complained about the bottle but it works just fine for me. Love the brand. I haven't noticed any difference in my eye area while using this product so maybe not worth the price but I haven't had any negative issues with this product so far.

reviews.headline: Great product, horrible delivery system
reviews.comments: I really like indie lee products they are cleaber- not going to say jon toxic vut cleaner and mousturizing. However this packaging is terrible. I can barely get product out. Ive only had it a week, wjll see if I keep it

reviews.headline: Had an allergie reaction despite not having sensitive skin
reviews.comments:
I try new skincare all the time, like 3-4 new products a month, and I never have an allergic reaction, but this made my undereye and cheek area itchy (where I applied it) and red!
I thought it was maybe another product so I tried it two more times with no other products, and had the same reaction each time. I would not recommend.

reviews.headline: Great eye cream, bad bottle design
reviews.comments:
This eye cream is very moisturizing and does make my eyes look smoother! However it's very hard to get out of the bottle. You have to hit the nozzle multiple times for the cream to come out and then you may get too much.

Great product, horrible container.

media.headline: Great to smooth out fine lines!

faceoff_positive.comments:
I love this eye cream, it is incredibly hydrating yet absorbent on the skin. It is one of the best eye creams Ive ever used and for the price per volume it should be. Typically when using eye creams i look for a product that is think yet absorbs well, no or faint fragrance, and doesn't burn if it (accidentally) gets into eye....and this product delivers on all accounts and my only annoyance is with the packaging and not the actual product. 
CONS: the packaging. The pump disperses way too much product per pump ( like double what I would need) thus forcing my to use the entire tube much more quickly than competitors I've previously used. I have had this product approximately 3 months ONLY USING 2-3 NIGHTS A WEEK and I have used it all.  That being said  -  I will buy again but for the price, I cannot justify using one of these every month.
faceoff_positive.headline: luxurious but product will be used up quickly

faceoff_negative.comments:
I try new skincare all the time, like 3-4 new products a month, and I never have an allergic reaction, but this made my undereye and cheek area itchy (where I applied it) and red!
I thought it was maybe another product so I tried it two more times with no other products, and had the same reaction each time. I would not recommend.
faceoff_negative.headline: Had an allergie reaction despite not having sensitive skin
